name: Michael Howell From Capital Wars
title: Global Liquidity Waving Or Drowning
text:
Synopsis
Global liquidity is showing signs of near-term revival, with modest upward trends driven by improved bond market conditions and reduced collateral volatility.

Key Insights
- Current global liquidity levels remain slightly below the peak experienced in late-2024
- Positive trend indicators include:
  - Slight rally in bond markets
  - Decreased bond market volatility
  - Lower 'haircuts' demanded by credit providers for posted collateral
- A more detailed analysis of raw liquidity data is forthcoming in future publication
